snippet: The family of Tamir Rice, a 12-year-old who had a pellet gun when he was shot by a Cleveland police officer, filed a wrongful-death lawsuit Friday.
abstract: Family of Tamir Rice, 12-year-old boy who was shot by Cleveland Police Officer Tim Loehmann, files wrongful-death lawsuit; police video shows Rice, who was carrying a pellet gun, was shot within seconds after Loehmann approached him.
lead_paragraph: The family of Tamir Rice, a 12-year-old who had a pellet gun when he was shot by a Cleveland police officer, filed a wrongful-death lawsuit Friday.

headline.main: Ohio: Family of Boy Killed by Cleveland Officer Sues
headline.print_headline: Ohio: Family of Boy Killed by Officer Sues
